devdoc.author: IDXFlow Team
devdoc.details: Implements multiple reward mechanisms including volume-based rewards, staking tiers,      ZK proofs, KYC compliance, gas rebates, and cross-chain synchronization

AccessControlBadConfirmation().details: The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this.

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

bindToToken(address,uint256).details: Enables NFT-based account functionality and enhanced features

bondedStake(uint256,uint256).details: Bonds tokens that can be slashed for misbehavior

params.lockDuration: Duration of the bond lock in seconds

claimKYCRewards(uint256).details: Requires identity verification for regulatory compliance

params.volume: The user's trading volume for reward calculation

claimRewardsPrivate(uint256).details: Provides protection against front-running and sandwich attacks

params.volume: The user's trading volume for reward calculation

claimRewardsWithSig(uint256,uint256,byte.details: Enables gasless reward claiming through signed messages

params.epoch: The epoch for which rewards are claimed
params.volume: The user's trading volume for the epoch

claimVestedRewards().details: Allows users to claim rewards that have completed vesting

claimWithZKProof(uint256,bytes).details: Enables privacy-preserving reward claims without revealing sensitive data

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

lzReceive(uint16,bytes,uint64,bytes).details: Callback function for LayerZero message reception

mirrorState(uint16).details: Uses LayerZero to synchronize state across chains

multicall(bytes[]).details: Enables batching of operations for gas efficiency

params.data: Array of encoded function call data

returns.results: Array of return data from each call

onTransferReceived(address,address,uint2.details: Automatically stakes tokens sent via transferAndCall

returns._0: The function selector to confirm receipt

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

requestUnstake(uint256).details: Initiates unstaking process with mandatory waiting period

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setMerkleRoot(bytes32).details: Only governance can update the merkle root for security

slashBond(address).details: Emergency function to penalize misbehavior (requires appropriate permissions)

params.user: The user whose bond to slash

stakeWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint8,by.details: Combines permit approval and staking in a single transaction

toggleAutoCompound(bool).details: Allows users to automatically stake their rewards

updateRewardRate(uint256).details: Governance function to adjust reward economics

withdrawBond().details: Allows users to reclaim their bonded tokens after expiration

withdrawUnstaked().details: Completes the unstaking process and transfers tokens

devdoc.title: IDXFlow Order Flow Rewards Contract

GasRebate(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when gas rebate is provided

RewardsVested(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when rewards are added to vesting

StakeUpdated(address,uint256,uint8).notice: Emitted when user stake is updated

VestedRewardsClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when vested rewards are claimed

VolumeRecorded(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when user volume is recorded

GOVERNOR_ROLE().notice: Role for governance functions and parameter updates

bindToToken(address,uint256).notice: Binds user account to an ERC-6551 token bound account

bondedStake(uint256,uint256).notice: Creates a bonded stake with lock period

bonds(address).notice: User bonded stakes for slashing protection

claimKYCRewards(uint256).notice: Claims rewards with KYC/AML compliance verification

claimMerkleReward(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claims rewards using merkle proof verification

claimRewardsPrivate(uint256).notice: Claims rewards with MEV protection through private mempool

claimRewardsWithSig(uint256,uint256,byte.notice: Claims rewards using a meta-transaction signature

claimWithZKProof(uint256,bytes).notice: Claims rewards using zero-knowledge proof verification

defaultVestingEpochs().notice: Default number of epochs for reward vesting

epochDuration().notice: Duration of each reward epoch in seconds

erc6551Registry().notice: ERC-6551 registry for token bound accounts

lastEpochReset().notice: Timestamp of the last epoch reset

maxGasRebate().notice: Maximum gas amount eligible for rebate

merkleClaimed(address).notice: Tracks which addresses have claimed their merkle rewards

merkleRoot().notice: Merkle root for batch reward distributions

minVolumeThreshold().notice: Minimum volume required to claim rewards in an epoch

mirrorState(uint16).notice: Mirrors contract state to another chain

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Executes multiple function calls in a single transaction

onTransferReceived(address,address,uint2.notice: Handles ERC-1363 token transfers for automatic staking

pendingUnstakes(address).notice: Amount of tokens pending unstaking for each user

permitToken().notice: Permit-enabled version of the reward token for gasless approvals

rebateRate().notice: Rate for gas rebates (tokens per gas unit)

requestUnstake(uint256).notice: Requests unstaking of tokens with cooldown period

rewardRatePerVolume().notice: Reward rate per unit of volume (scaled by 1e6)

setMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: Sets the merkle root for batch reward distributions

stakeWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint8,by.notice: Stakes tokens using EIP-2612 permit for gasless approval

token().notice: The main reward token used throughout the system

totalDistributed().notice: Total amount of rewards distributed across all users

unstakeCooldown().notice: Cooldown period for unstaking in seconds

unstakeUnlockTime(address).notice: Timestamp when unstaked tokens become withdrawable

updateRewardRate(uint256).notice: Updates the reward rate per volume

withdrawBond().notice: Withdraws bonded stake after lock period

withdrawUnstaked().notice: Withdraws unstaked tokens after cooldown period

zkVerifier().notice: Zero-knowledge proof verifier for privacy-preserving claims

userdoc.notice: Advanced DeFi rewards system with staking, vesting, and cross-chain capabilities
